Home.title: CS2 Statistics
Home.subtitle: Track your CS2 stats in Competitive and Premier mode
Home.subtitle1: and earn skins for your skill

steamBot.title: Skins for
steamBot.description: Log into your account, and you can see
steamBot.description1: what you can earn skins for.

postMatchAdvancedStats.title: Advanced Post-Match Statistics
postMatchAdvancedStats.description: After your match is processed, you can check out our advanced CS2 statistics on the scoreboard. We have all the basic metrics, but you can also see who got the first kills, who traded the most (not just skins), and who was the clutch king!

roundByRoundMatchBreakdown.title: Round-by-Round Match Breakdown
roundByRoundMatchBreakdown.description: We provide detailed round data, such as the method of round victory, whether there was a clutch, and a complete kill list. Perfect for finding that round where your friend died in the first 10 seconds!

automaticMatchTracking.title: Automatic Match Tracking
automaticMatchTracking.description: No need to manually add games after they end anymore! All you need to do is sign in with Steam, add the game authentication code, possibly add a match if it’s not there yet, and we’ll automatically track all your new CS2 matches, helping you monitor your progress to Global Elite.

detailedMatchHistory.title: Detailed Match History
detailedMatchHistory.description: CS2 is a great game, but in-game, you can only see the last 8 matches unless you download the demo, which isn’t very convenient. We allow you to track your entire match history.

vacBanTracking.title: VAC Ban Tracking
vacBanTracking.description: We constantly check our database for VAC and Overwatch bans. When players get banned, you’ll see them in the 'Who You Played With' tab in your profile. There’s even a special filter to show only the players you’ve played with who got banned.

trackPersonalProgress.title: Track Personal Progress
trackPersonalProgress.description: After 1000 hours of playtime, sometimes you want to see how much you’ve improved. You can check the charts in your profile to evaluate this. Keep in mind that when ranking up, your stats may temporarily drop, but once they start growing again, you might be ready for the next rank!

eseaIntegration.description: If you want to play against fewer cheaters but love our statistics, we now support ESEA match pages!

getStarted.title: Get Started Now
getStarted.description: Start tracking your CS2 stats right now! All you need is to sign in with Steam below, and we’ll guide you through the next steps!

Second.pleaseRegister: To see detailed information, please register.

Footer.description: csstat.com is an online service for tracking CS2 statistics. Start monitoring your CS2 competitive match history now.
Footer.forFeedback: For feedback, contact me at: support@csstats.com
